lyrics:
8 contributorsjust a kiss lyricsprechorus

and im gonna make it up to ya by the end of this song

chorus
just a kiss just a kiss just a kiss

all it takes is one all it takes is one

verse 1
yeah mentally been pushing away
my past got me feeling some way
ive been tryna get better
but im always up or out of the states

number changed im kinda late
fears of you with another man
but i hope youre listening i gotta say

things bad but i aint been asking
been working like a movie
so i hope you aint been casting
you aint even sleeping
you call im in a meeting
cant talk im meetinggreeting
you dont need this treatment so
you might also likeprechorus
im sorry for what i did please baby come home
and im gonna make it up to ya by the end of this song
and i been alone since you been gone baby whoa

just a kiss just a kiss just a kiss
just a kiss just a kiss just a kiss
all it takes is one all it takes is one

yeah okay

and i hope it makes the alist

now that is forbes list

your hand cup like facin

now its time for your day off
